intro: Kirganelia mauritiana, commonly known as the Mauritius starflower, is a flowering plant native to the island of Mauritius. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat loss, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
